import React from 'react' import ingredientStyles from './ingredient.module.css' import { Typography } from '@ya.praktikum/react-developer-burger-ui-components' import { CurrencyIcon } from '@ya.praktikum/react-developer-burger-ui-components' import { Counter } from '@ya.praktikum/react-developer-burger-ui-components' function Ingredient({name, price, image, setIsModalOpen, setCardData}) { const onClick = () => { setIsModalOpen(true) setCardData() } return (

{price}

{name}

 ) } export default Ingredient
